name: atproto_users
comment: Central table of all ATProto accounts that have been created

columns.name: at_wiki
columns.comment: The wiki db key that made this account

columns.name: at_platform
columns.comment: The platform that the account was made on

columns.name: at_platform_uniq
columns.comment: The nth account (Of platform type) made by this wiki

columns.name: at_handle
columns.comment: Randomly generated string handle used for the account

columns.name: at_domain
columns.comment: Domain string used as the handle for the account

columns.name: at_email
columns.comment: The email used to register the account

columns.name: at_passcode
columns.comment: The password that was used to make the account

name: atproto_optin
comment: Central table for holding Categories that wikis have opted into allowing reposts for

columns.name: opt_account
columns.comment: Unique ID of the wiki account
